text: <!channel> Hi everyone! I wanted to update everyone that I have pushed our Pitch document as well as any screenshots from the figma masterfile onto our github repo. Cameron and I will talk with the TA on Wednesday to discuss the pitch, and will let you guys know what he says. After the approval, we will schedule a meeting with everyone attending to discuss sprint planning as well as user stories. Have a good week!
